entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
